title: Meanwhile in Baltimore… Trump is addressing the House Republican retreat
text:
But that doesn’t mean the Democratic debate is not on his mind. He used his address to GOP lawmakers to insult Democratic candidates, including using his nickname for Sen. Elizabeth Warren that has been criticized as racist.

“I hit Pocahontas too early. She’s emerged from the ashes,” he said of Warren. “Now it looks like she can beat Sleepy Joe” — a reference to former vice president Joe Biden.

He also mocked South Bend, Ind., Mayor Pete Buttigieg’s name and height.

“He’s doing a rotten job running his own city,” Trump said.
description: But that doesn’t mean the Democratic debate is not on his mind. He used his address to GOP lawmakers to insult Democratic candidates, including using his nickname for Sen. Elizabeth Warren that has been criticized as racist.
